>> Is it so complicated to make the Trello interface configurable?
> Yes, it is complicated. Trello interface will not be configurable to the degree you are proposing in the observable future.It's rather unfortunate that investing many man-years into bad-to-worse re/designs is less complicated than giving users freedom to make it better and avoid the pain
Trello was excellent before Atlassian purchased it and added bloat. I often wished for a clone of the pre-Atlassian Trello.
